example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <Badge>Tip</Badge>
    <Badge ariaLabel="Train" icon={<Icons.Train />} />
    <Badge ariaLabel="4 passengers" icon={<Icons.Passengers />}>
      4
    </Badge>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Default badges
info.description: Badges should present simple and short static information. They can be just text, just an icon, or an icon and text.
